properties.areaDesc: Lake Superior from Saxon Harbor WI to Upper Entrance to Portage Canal MI 5NM off shore to the US/Canadian border including Isle Royal National Park; Ontonagon to Upper Entrance of Portage Canal MI; Black River To Ontonagon MI; Saxon Harbor WI to Black River MI
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued March 1 at 4:29AM EST until March 2 at 5:00AM EST by NWS Marquette MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 20 to 25 kt with gusts up to 35 kt and waves
6 to 9 feet expected.

* WHERE...Saxon Harbor WI to Black River MI, Black River to
Ontonagon MI, Ontonagon to Upper Entrance of Portage Canal MI
and Lake Superior from Saxon Harbor WI to Upper Entrance to
Portage Canal MI 5NM off shore to the US/Canadian border
including Isle Royale National Park.

* WHEN...From 9 PM EST /8 PM CST/ this evening to 5 AM EST /4 AM
CST/ Monday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM EST /8 PM CST/ THIS EVENING TO 5 AM EST /4 AM CST/ MONDAY
